alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 11:55AM EST until March 02 at 9:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. .Rises on area rivers occurred as a result of recent rainfall. Another system later this week is expected to create additional rises on area rivers as well. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Lowland and farmland flooding near the river begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 12.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
